column4: whears the magical hidden trash folder gone to now? uit used to be /home/<user>/.trash but its changed locations and now i cant delete corrupted items from the command line[sudo rm -R /home/bluefoxx/.trash/*] as my computer decided to freeze while i was moving a folder between disk drives
speaking of which, my computer has been completely freezing a lot lately
when im doing not much on it[only burning a disk or browsing the web/files]
